description.author: Julian Ospald
description.description:
A rewrite of the shell script ghcup, for providing
a more stable user experience and exposing an API.

package-flags.name: tui
package-flags.description: Build the brick powered tui (ghcup tui). This is disabled on windows.

package-flags.name: internal-downloader
package-flags.description: Compile the internal downloader, which links against OpenSSL. This is disabled on windows.
